Title: Solyaris
Writer: Nikolay Kemarskiy (screenplay), Stanislaw Lem (author), N. Kemasky
Actors: Vasiliy Lanovoy, Antonina Pilyus, Vladimir Etush, Viktor Zozulin
Plot: Kris Kelvin joins the space station orbiting the planet Solaris, only to find its two crew members plagued by "phantoms," creations of Solaris. Kelvin is soon confronted with his own phantom, taking the shape of his dead wife Hari.
